text: The Audi Cup 2009 (the first edition of the Audi Cup) was a two-day tournament that took place in Germany. The tournament featured four teams, AC Milan, Boca Juniors, Bayern Munich and Manchester United. The winners of the tournament were Bayern Munich, defeating Manchester United 0(7) - 0(6). Boca Juniors took third place, defeating AC Milan 1(4) - 1(3). ==Matches== Category:2009 in association football Category:2009 in Europe Category:2000s in Germany Category:Audi Cup Category:21st century in Munich Category:July 2009 events
title: Audi Cup 2009
